Job Title: Senior Software Development Engineer - Python Development
Job Description: Roles and ResponsibilitiesSenior Software Development Engineer - Python Development (Product based)• Be a hands-on developer, make regular code contributions to the development of the product.• Actively contribute to new ideas and help others.• Building complex systems with high quality, with repeatable success for on-time delivery• Work closely with QA, Product Management, and Support• Solving complex problems; applying new perspectives to existing solutions• Troubleshoot customer escalations and provide on-time quality resolutions. • Working independently with minimal guidanceRequirements• Strong coding skills in Python, Shell-Scripting• Good understanding of databases (Oracle, Postgres, DB2, HANA preferred)• At least an undergraduate degree in computer scienceExperience working with Unix• Strong debugging, problem-solving skills• Ability to work a flexible schedule to accommodate business needs• Excellent verbal and written communication skills with the ability to adjust to meet the needs of the audience• Detail-oriented, with the ability to work with time constraints and guide others to meet deadlines• Understanding of Branching, Versioning, Source Control, Release Managementengineering gradutae from top tier colleges
